# rOstluft.rmweather

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package creates wrapper around rmweather to create meteorological normalisation using Random Forest. 
The role of rOstluft is to provide the input data needed.


Placeholder, see main.R in root directory for an example:

* create folder tmp
* add data file tmp/Airmo_export_OL_Dauerstandorte_h1_20160101_bis_20200327.csv
* perhaps edit settings for local und remote store in main.R
* run main.R
